problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,E,F分别在AD和BC上,AB∥EF∥DC,且DE=3,DA=5,CF=4,则FB等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, E and F are on AD and BC respectively, AB ∥ EF ∥ DC, and DE = N_0, DA = N_1, CF = N_2, then FB is equal to ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理,掌握三条平行线截两条直线,所得的对应线段成比例是解题的关键．
